00013 // Local Operator for IPBS
00014 
00015 template<typename M, typename B, typename J>
00016 class PBLocalOperator : 
00017   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianApplyVolume<PBLocalOperator<M, B, J> >,
00018   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianVolume<PBLocalOperator<M, B, J> >,
00019   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianApplyBoundary<PBLocalOperator<M, B, J> >,
00020   public Dune::PDELab::NumericalJacobianBoundary<PBLocalOperator<M, B, J> >, 
00021   public Dune::PDELab::FullVolumePattern,
00022   public Dune::PDELab::LocalOperatorDefaultFlags
00023 {
00024 public:
00025   // pattern assembly flags
00026   enum { doPatternVolume = true };
00027 
00028   // residual assembly flags
00029   enum { doAlphaVolume = true };
00030   enum { doAlphaBoundary = true };                                // assemble boundary
00031 
00032   // constructor parametrized by regions and boundary classes
00033   PBLocalOperator (const M& m_, const B& b_, const J& j_, 
00034                    std::vector<double>& fluxContainer_, 
00035                    unsigned int intorder_=2)  // needs boundary cond. type
00036     : m(m_), b(b_), j(j_), fluxContainer(fluxContainer_), intorder(intorder_)
00037   {}
00038 
00039   // volume integral depending on test and ansatz functions
00040   template<typename EG, typename LFSU, typename X, typename LFSV, typename R>
00041   void alpha_volume (const EG& eg, const LFSU& lfsu, const X& x, const LFSV& lfsv, R& r) const
00042   {
00043     // extract some types
00044     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00045       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::DomainFieldType DF;
00046     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00047       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeFieldType RF;
00048     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00049       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::JacobianType JacobianType;
00050     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00051       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeType RangeType;
00052     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::SizeType size_type;
00053         
00054     // dimensions
00055     const int dim = EG::Geometry::dimension;
00056     const int dimw = EG::Geometry::dimensionworld;
00057 
00058     // select quadrature rule
00059     Dune::GeometryType gt = eg.geometry().type();
00060     const Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim>& 
00061       rule = Dune::QuadratureRules<DF,dim>::rule(gt,intorder);
00062 
00063     // loop over quadrature points
00064     for (typename Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim>::const_iterator 
00065            it=rule.begin(); it!=rule.end(); ++it)
00066       {
00067         // evaluate basis functions on reference element
00068         std::vector<RangeType> phi(lfsu.size());
00069         lfsu.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(it->position(),phi);
00070 
00071         // compute u at integration point
00072         RF u=0.0;
00073         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00074           u += x[i]*phi[i];
00075 
00076         // evaluate gradient of basis functions on reference element
00077         std::vector<JacobianType> js(lfsu.size());
00078         lfsu.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(it->position(),js);
00079 
00080         // transform gradients from reference element to real element
00081         const Dune::FieldMatrix<DF,dimw,dim> 
00082           jac = eg.geometry().jacobianInverseTransposed(it->position());
00083         std::vector<Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> > gradphi(lfsu.size());
00084         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00085           jac.mv(js[i][0],gradphi[i]);
00086         
00087         // compute gradient of u
00088         Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> gradu(0.0);
00089         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00090           gradu.axpy(x[i],gradphi[i]);
00091 
00092         // evaluate parameters; 
00093         Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> 
00094         globalpos = eg.geometry().global(it->position());
00095 
00096         // Parameters describing the PDE
00097         RF f = -1.0 * sysParams.get_lambda2i() * sinh(u);
00098         RF a = 0.0; 
00099 
00100         // integrate grad u * grad phi_i + a*u*phi_i - f phi_i
00101         RF factor = it->weight()*eg.geometry().integrationElement(it->position());
00102 
00103         // choose correct metric for integration (depending on symmetry)
00104         RF metric;
00105         switch ( sysParams.get_symmetry() )
00106         {
00107                 case 1: metric = 1.0; break; // "2D_cylinder"
00108                 case 2: metric = globalpos[1]*2.0*sysParams.pi; break;   // "2D_sphere"
00109                 case 3: metric = 1.0; break; // "3D"
00110                 default:    metric = 0.0; std::cerr << "Error: Could not detect metric" << std::endl;
00111         }
00112         // Integration with added term for metric
00113         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00114           r[i] += ( gradu*gradphi[i] + a*u*phi[i] - f*phi[i] )*factor*metric;
00115       }
00116   }
00117 
00118   // boundary integral
00119   template<typename IG, typename LFSU, typename X, typename LFSV, typename R>
00120   void alpha_boundary (const IG& ig, const LFSU& lfsu_s, const X& x_s, 
00121                        const LFSV& lfsv_s, R& r_s) const
00122   {
00123     // some types
00124     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00125       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::DomainFieldType DF;
00126     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00127       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeFieldType RF;
00128     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00129       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeType RangeType;
00130     typedef typename LFSV::Traits::SizeType size_type;
00131     typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00132       Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::JacobianType JacobianType;
00133         
00134     // dimensions
00135     const int dim = IG::dimension;
00136        
00137     // select quadrature rule for face
00138     Dune::GeometryType gtface = ig.geometryInInside().type();
00139     const Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim-1>& 
00140       rule = Dune::QuadratureRules<DF,dim-1>::rule(gtface,intorder);
00141 
00142     // loop over quadrature points and integrate normal flux
00143     for (typename Dune::QuadratureRule<DF,dim-1>::const_iterator it=rule.begin(); 
00144          it!=rule.end(); ++it)
00145       {
00146         // evaluate boundary condition type
00147         typename B::Traits::RangeType bctype;
00148         b.evaluate(ig,it->position(),bctype);
00149  
00150         // skip rest if we are on Dirichlet boundary
00151         if (bctype>0) continue;
00152 
00153         // position of quadrature point in local coordinates of element 
00154         Dune::FieldVector<DF,dim> local = ig.geometryInInside().global(it->position());
00155 
00156         // evaluate basis functions at integration point
00157         std::vector<RangeType> phi(lfsv_s.size());
00158         lfsu_s.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(local,phi);
00159         
00160         // evaluate flux boundary condition
00161         typename J::Traits::RangeType y;
00162         j.evaluate(ig, y, fluxContainer);
00163         
00164         // integrate j
00165         RF factor = it->weight()*ig.geometry().integrationElement(it->position());
00166 
00167         // choose correct metric for integration (depending on symmetry)
00168         RF metric;
00169         switch ( sysParams.get_symmetry() )
00170         {
00171                 case 1: metric = 1.0; break; // "2D_cylinder"
00172                 case 2: metric = local[1]*2.0*sysParams.pi; break;   // "2D_sphere"
00173                 case 3: metric = 1.0; break; // "3D"
00174                 default:    metric = 0.0; std::cerr << "Error: Could not detect metric" << std::endl;
00175         }
00176         // Integration with added term for metric
00177         for (size_type i=0; i<lfsv_s.size(); i++)
00178           r_s[i] += y*phi[i]*factor*metric;
00179       }
00180   }
00181   
00182 private:
00183   const M& m;
00184   const B& b;
00185   const J& j;
00186   std::vector<double>& fluxContainer;
00187   unsigned int intorder;
00188 };
